newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Yaohan Food falls on low general offer.
newsitem.headline: Yaohan Food falls on low general offer.

text.p: Yaohan Food Processing and Trading Co Ltd shares fell more than 20 percent on Tuesday after Four Seas Mercantile Holdings Ltd set a low price in its general offer for the meat trader's shares, brokers said.
Shares of Yaohan Food were down HK$0.25 or 22.52 percent to HK$0.86 at midday on volume of 5.70 million shares.
Four Seas said earlier on Tuesday it would raise its stake in Yaohan Food by buying a 30.79 percent stake at HK$0.72 per share, brokers said.
"A wide gap between the offer price and the trading price triggered selling," said a senior sales manager at a regional brokerage. "The adjustment would help narrow the gap."

Four Seas said it agreed to raise its stake in Yaohan Food to about 40 percent from 9.21 percent for HK$54.92 million cash and, on completion of the deal, would launch a cash offer at HK$0.72 per share.
